objects.text:
• Advanced Sleep Tracking
• Fitness Monitoring
• Bionic Gold Design
• Made in India

product_details.name: ULTRAHUMAN Ring AIR-Smart Ring Health Tracker, Size First Sizing Kit,Sleep Tracker,Smart Ring for Men/Women,Fitness Tracker (Made in India, Bionic Gold, 8)
product_details.description:
- Package Dimensions: 8.46 x 7.17 x 3.19 inches.
- Item Weight: 3.7 Grams.
- Batteries: 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included).
- Country of Origin: India.
- Memory Storage Capacity: 0.5 MB.

banner_details:
This visually striking banner is divided into four quadrants with vibrant color blocks and precise yellow grid lines. It promotes a premium smart health ring using a futuristic design. The top-left section contains three separate text layers: the bold "heading" in bright yellow, the white "subheading", and an all-caps yellow "tagline" below that. The bottom-left quadrant showcases a bulleted feature list ("description") in white, followed by the product "price" in large yellow font, and a distinct yellow rectangular button with black "cta" text reading a call to action.

The image of the sleek gold ring ("product_image") dominates the right half, adding high-tech appeal. Decorative circular graphic accents and dotted motifs balance the asymmetrical layout. The background uses layered SVG elements with subtly overlaid circles and lines for depth.

**Color Palette:**
- Midnight Blue (#16213E)
- Deep Sky Blue (#0F3460)
- Regal Purple (#533A71)
- Charcoal Black (#2C3333)
- Gold (#FFD700)
- White (#FFFFFF)
- Black (#000000)
product_color: This product image features a sleek, futuristic ring with a luxurious metallic gold outer finish and intricate internal electronics, highlighted with precision. The dominant color is a polished gold (#D4AF37), giving the ring a premium and elegant appearance. The inner structure combines matte black (#1A1A1A) elements for contrast and depth. Subtle accents of red (#FF3B30) and green (#34C759) from LED indicators add vibrancy and draw attention to the technology inside. The blend of gold and black provides sophistication, while the luminous LED lights highlight innovation. This color palette is ideal for a modern, tech-forward advertisement banner conveying luxury and functionality.
